title: Corporate Credit Risk Prediction: Machine Learning and Credit Risk Management

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Training to improve practical application capabilities in corporate credit risk prediction for current practitioners

learning_goals: Corporate credit risk can be predicted by utilizing various machine learning algorithms (e.g., random forest, linear regression)
The impact of Corporate Social Irresponsibility (CSI) data on credit risk prediction can be analyzed
Methods for evaluating and comparing the predictive accuracy of ML models can be explained

resources: Internal credit assessment case study materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
